Header: Japanese company to show industrial robots at Shanghai import expo
Content: Japanese Nachi-Fujikoshi Corporation, known for its industrial robots, displayed its industrial robots with the fastest operation speed in the world at last yearâ€™s China International Import Expo. This year it is to demonstrate some of its latest industrial robots at the upcoming second CIIE. Nachi will present a mini six-axis assembly robot, which can continually make pencil leads with a diameter of 0.5 cm aim at each other with an error of no more than plus or minus 0.02 mm. The robot weighing one kg is most suitable for small electronic components assembly in dust-free workshops.
